name: 楊士萱
objective: This course will address both theory and practice of video signal processing, mainly focused on the video coding. The MPEG standards will be covered in depth.
schedule:
1.Introduction
2.Entropy coding
3.Transformation and quantization
4.Predictive coding and motion estimation
5.MPEG-1/2 video coding standards
6.MPEG-4 part-2 and part-10 (H.264)
7.High Efficiency Video Coding (HEVC, H.265)
8.MPEG-4 Parts 12/14/15, MPEG-7, MPEG-21
9.Special topics in video coding
10.Wavelet coding and JPEG 2000
materials:
Textbook: 
No textbook. Lecture handouts will be given in the class. Please make a hard copy for your own use.
References:
1.楊士萱、尤信程、陳偉凱，「數位電視之多媒體技術」，全華圖書公司，Oct. 2007，ISBN 978-957-21-5914-9。
2.Other references are listed in the handouts.
